price: 78.  (Xus) Daawuud iyo Sulaymaan, markay ka garsooreen arrinkii beerta markuu daaqay (beerta) adhi dad leeyihiin (goor habeen ah), Waxaanu aheyn Kuwo garsoorkoodii u marag ah (arka).*
arabic: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ إِذۡ يَحۡكُمَانِ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡثِ إِذۡ نَفَشَتۡ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكۡمِهِمۡ شَٰهِدِينَ
footnotes: * Wuxuu Daawuud xukumay in adhigaa beertaa daaqay la siiyo ninkii lahaa beerta  khasaarahii loo geystey darteed.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wadāwūda wasulaymāna idh yaḥkumāni fī al-ḥarthi idh nafashat fīhi ghanamu al-qawmi wakunnā liḥuk'mihim shāhidīna
